page.title: 02LAND OWNERSHIP & BOUNDARIES
page.content: There are three counties included in this area, Cambrideshire in the Western quarter(squares 4,8 & most of 12) Bedfordshire in the north western eighth(squares 1 & half of 2) and the rest being in Hertfordshire. The central third is owned by a single landowner. The remaining Hertfordshire land is owned by three others and Hertfordshire County Council who rent it to smallholders. These small farms (75 to 100 acres) were intended to be first time farms for young men but due to the shortage of farmland most of the tenants are older. There are few farms to rent and buying is well beyond most people's pockets.
